Text:
Two new episodes of Ghost Lab in the space of two days, awesome as always from trialNerror

Happy new year!

Notice the title, the media info, and the DVR controls plus TV logo that this isn't my ripping.  

This is very watchable, but to me the picture is too small and so when you expand to full screen it gets pretty blotchy.  

Will post my own, larger, logo-less version later this week.

I got a thanks!

Happy New Year!

Of course you got a thanks!  Never would have found it on the blogspot if it weren't for your suggestion.

HAPPY NEW YEAR!!!
